headline.main: EDISON IS EULOGIZED IN WORLD TRIBUTES; Notables in Government and in Science Pay Homage to Him as Builder of Civilization. 'ONE OF THE TRULY GREAT' His "Social Understanding" as Well as Creative Genius Lauded In Expressions of Sorrow.

snippet: Expressions of regret at Mr. Edison's passing and tributes to the part he played in the development of modern life were voiced by prominent men here and abroad when told that the inventor's death was imminent. Among them were:
